verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
And he set me on fire and I am burning alive.
With his breath in my lungs, I am coming undone. (2X)

verse.name: p1
verse.lines:
And I cannot hold it in
and remain composed.
Love's taken over me so I propose
The letting myself go. I am letting myself go.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
You are my joy, You are my joy,
You are my joy, You are my joy. (2X)
